mapper.select: select aa.name,aa.owner_type,aa.owner_addr,aa.tel,aa.e_mail,aa.cert_type,aa.cert_number from r_owner aa,r_owner_property bb,r_parking_space cc where aa.id = bb.owner_id and bb.property_id=cc.id and cc.id=#{id} and bb.property_type=#{type} and bb.is_delete=#{del} and cc.is_delete=#{del}

SELECT s_company.NAME AS comp_name, r_community.NAME AS comm_name, r_comm_area.NAME AS comm_area_name, r_building.NAME AS buildiing_name, r_owner_property.* FROM r_owner_property LEFT JOIN s_company ON r_owner_property.comp_id = s_company.id LEFT JOIN r_community ON r_owner_property.comm_id = r_community.id LEFT JOIN r_comm_area ON r_owner_property.comm_area_id = r_comm_area.id LEFT JOIN r_building ON r_owner_property.buildiing_id = r_building.id WHERE r_owner_property.is_delete = 0 and r_owner_property.owner_id = #{ownerId}
